messages.text:

https://go.googlecode.com/hg

"hwhen"?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=aa9382857ab2 ***

misc/dist: support upload only (no build)

subject: code review 5940050: misc/dist: support upload only (no build)
